definition: to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet
affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means
lit. to look at flowers in the fog (idiom); fig. blurred vision
to swallow clouds and blow out fog (idiom)/to blow cigarette or opium smoke
the clouds melt and the mists disperse (idiom)/to clear up/to vanish into thin air

sentences.english: Upslope fog is usually dense, and extends to high altitudes.
sentences.chinese: 上坡霧通常是密集，並延伸到高海拔地區。

sentences.english: In early morning mist that rolls in from the coast, two brown bears tussle like teenagers.
sentences.chinese: 清晨，霧從海岸邊湧來，兩隻棕熊像頑童般嬉鬧。

sentences.english: It is feasible that both exhaustion and wetting by steam fog are carried out in the chamber with low pressure.
sentences.chinese: 低氣壓室中既抽真空又用蒸汽霧溼潤是可行的。

sentences.english: Strip bainite is obtained under the condition of fog cooling.
sentences.chinese: 在霧冷淬火條件下，獲得了條狀貝氏體。

sentences.english: As the mist was closing in we decided to stay where we were.
sentences.chinese: 由於霧越來越逼近，我們決定留在原地不動。

sentences.english: Get up, Captain and open the door, and you will find the fog gone.
sentences.chinese: 起來，船主把門打開，你要看見霧已經全消了。

sentences.english: The valley was hidden from view by mist.
sentences.chinese: 溪谷隱藏在霧藹之中，看不見了。

sentences.english: If you feel the attached picture like "flowers in mist", then you must be a little drunk…
sentences.chinese: 如看到附圖像霧又像花，那你一定是有些微醉了。

sentences.english: There will be fogging, a wet windshield, raindrops and wipers.
sentences.chinese: 會有霧，溼的擋風玻璃，雨滴和雨刮。

sentences.english: The fog is composed of the water droplets suspending in the air.
sentences.chinese: 霧是由大量懸浮在空氣中的小水滴組成。

sentences.english: There's a mist covering Tehran right now.
sentences.chinese: 現在德黑蘭已經被厚厚的霧覆蓋住了。

sentences.english: When the driver finally discovered the trolleybus coming towards him through the fog.
sentences.chinese: 當他最後透過霧發現電車向他駛來時。

sentences.english: It's in the same way, just like this, how fog disorients our mind.
sentences.chinese: 同理，就像這樣，霧怎麼在迷失我們的心靈呢。

sentences.english: He is a vaporous and shifting mirage.
sentences.chinese: 他像是一團霧，漂移不定，變幻莫測。

sentences.english: You can’t see it because it is covered with fog. Although you can’t see it, I know it is there.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸，廟就在那兒，你看不見是因爲它被霧遮蓋住了。

definition: enclosing frame made of bamboo, wire etc/cage/basket/steamer basket/to cover/to cage/to embrace/to manipulate through trickery
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]
cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke
fine rain/drizzle/poem by Tang poet Li Shangyin 李商隱|李商隐
dawn/daybreak/to know/to let sb know/to make explicit
